pilots.name: Cad Bane
pilots.caption: Infamous Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 2 [Charge] to transfer 1 of your non-lock red or orange tokens to the defender.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.name: Viktor Hel
pilots.caption: Storied Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: After you defend, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attacker gains 1 stress token.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.name: Nom Lumb
pilots.caption: Laughing Bandit
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Front Arc]. If you do, treat your initiative as equal to that ship's until the end of the round.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.

pilots.name: Outer Rim Hunter
pilots.text: Due to its association with Cad Bane, the Rogue-class Starfighterhas found its way into the hands of other bounty hunters, especially those who operate in the lawless Outer Rim.

shipAbility.name: Dead to Rights
shipAbility.text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], defense dice cannot be modified using green tokens.
